title: Otome Game no Akuyaku Reijou o Tanoshimitai! - Novel Updates
genre: Comedy   Fantasy   Romance   School Life   Shoujo
tags: Age Progression   Engagement   Female Protagonist   Handsome Male Lead   Heartwarming   Magic   Otome Game   Reincarnation   Reverse Harem   Villainess Noble Girls
author: Hanano Ribo   花野リボ
description:
I, Liliana Rose, am a selfish and lively marquis’ daughter.

But, in my previous life, I was a normal girl that loved having fun!

Also, I remembered being burned to death if left as it is.

I don’t want that, I want to enjoy being the villainess of an Otome game!

Even if my engagement with the prince was decided by accident, and my adopted younger brother is up to all sorts of things… Anyway, I just want to have fun!>
